weka.attributeSelection

类 SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.attributeSelection.ASEvaluation
      • weka.attributeSelection.SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, AttributeEvaluator, CapabilitiesHandler, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler

    public class SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval
extends ASEvaluation
implements AttributeEvaluator, OptionHandler
    SymmetricalUncertAttributeEval :

    Evaluates the worth of an attribute by measuring the symmetrical uncertainty with respect to the class.

    SymmU(Class, Attribute) = 2 * (H(Class) - H(Class | Attribute)) / H(Class) + H(Attribute).

    Valid options are: 

     -M
  treat missing values as a seperate value.
    版本:
    $Revision: 5511 $
    作者:
    Mark Hall (mhall@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    另请参阅:
    Discretize, 序列化表格

      • buildEvaluator

        public void buildEvaluator(Instances data)
                    throws Exception
        Initializes a symmetrical uncertainty attribute evaluator. Discretizes all attributes that are numeric.
        指定者:
        buildEvaluator 在类中 ASEvaluation
        参数:
        data - set of instances serving as training data
        抛出:
        Exception - if the evaluator has not been generated successfully
